name.jp: レッドスピリットドラゴン

description.en: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.ar: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.br: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.cns: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.de: Dieser niedliche und schnelle Drache folgt seinem Meister und hebt fallen gelassene Gegenstände auf. Nur für Teilnehmer der Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena (zeitlich begrenzt) und Gewinner (dauerhaft)!
description.fi: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.fil: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.fr: Fait apparaître un dragon mignon et rapide qui suit son invocateur partout et qui ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis. Seulement pour les participants à l'Arène FWC 2023 (temps limités) et les vainqueurs (permanent) !
description.id: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.it: This cute and fast dragon follows its master around and picks up dropped items. Only for Flyff World Championship 2023 Arena participants (time limited) and winners (permanent)!
description.jp: このキュートで速いドラゴンは、主人を追いかけ、落としたアイテムを拾います。Flyff World Championship 2023 Arenaの参加者(期間限定)と優勝者(常設)のみ!

description.sp: Este lindo y veloz dragón sigue a su maestro y recoge los objetos caidos. ¡Solo para participantes de Arena Campeonato Mundial Flyff 2023 (por tiempo limitado) y ganadores (permanentes)!
